meanings.sent1: She grouses about having to do chores every day.
meanings.sent2: He often grouses about the long lines at the grocery store.
meanings.sent3: The cat groused at the closed door, wanting to go outside.
meanings.sent4: The old car engine groused loudly before finally starting.
meanings.sent5: The child groused all the way to school about not wanting to go.

meanings.sent1: His constant grouses about the food made everyone unhappy.
meanings.sent2: She wrote a letter to the manager expressing her grouse about the service.
meanings.sent3: The grouse about the broken elevator was finally fixed after many complaints.
meanings.sent4: The grouse from the customer led to improvements in the store's policies.
meanings.sent5: The grouse in the suggestion box was taken seriously by the company.
